s1.name: Download
s1.subtitle: ASM Stable Releases
s1.p: ASM stable releases can be downloaded from the ObjectWeb Forge.
s1.subtitle: ASM SVN Repository
s1.p: You can also download ASM from the ObjectWeb Forge SVN.
Note that the latest snapshot of the SVN repository is available for download. This snapshot is generated each night at 00:00 AM CEST.
